description: As part of the "hgst" volume type additions in Cinder ( bp/add-volume-driver-hgst-solutions ) need to include support for it in Nova in the libvirt driver to allow instances to connect to these volumes.
title: Add HGST volume type support

comments.content: As part of the "hgst" volume type additions in Cinder ( bp/add-volume-driver-hgst-solutions ) need to include support for it in Nova in the libvirt driver to allow instances to connect to these volumes.
